title: Question:
author: Chikito
content: If happens, Manchester City can be the 2nd club in the premier league after Manchester United. We can't ignore who is behind the achievement, yep, Pep Guardiola is one man behind the fantastic squad, if happens, He is the person who brings the Treble winner for the 2nd time after Barcelona 2008-2009. Pep could bring an 11th trophy for manchester city and a 1st-time champions league title. Tonight is a great history for Manchester City, I hope they don't waste this chance because Inter is now just an ordinary squad, nothing to special when compared to the final 2021 with Chelsea.Are you agree? or think differently?, because Inter quite surprised us this year.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: In the last 19 seasons no team has been a bigger favorite in the Champions League final than Manchester City. However, I don't think Inter will simply give up. After all, nobody reaches the final by accident, including them. But if City manages to score early, Inter's hopes may dwindle. The odds at the bookmakers for City to become European champions for the first time are only 1.25, while the odds for Inter to secure their fourth title are 4.00. In one match, anything is possible, and once the ball is kicked off, there won't be any clear favorites anymore, at least until the first goal is scored. The momentum is building up. Both teams deserve it, and may the best team win in the end.

comments.author: tusandii
comments.body: Quote from: decodx on June 10, 2023, 03:50:52 PMIn the last 19 seasons no team has been a bigger favorite in the Champions League final than Manchester City. However, I don't think Inter will simply give up. After all, nobody reaches the final by accident, including them. But if City manages to score early, Inter's hopes may dwindle. The odds at the bookmakers for City to become European champions for the first time are only 1.25, while the odds for Inter to secure their fourth title are 4.00. In one match, anything is possible, and once the ball is kicked off, there won't be any clear favorites anymore, at least until the first goal is scored. The momentum is building up. Both teams deserve it, and may the best team win in the end.Manchester City has always been a favorite in several leagues not only in the Champions League.The final will be a very phenomenal match and quite hot because the two teams are playing for this prestigious title.Anyone will definitely support Manchester City even though the Odds that can be obtained tend to be low, but at least a Manchester City victory will give satisfaction and pride to those who support him.I'm sure this match will involve a huge amount of money-spinning activity but since it's such a valuable title it's definitely more difficult for a third party to manipulate.I believe Manchester City will have three trophies this season.

comments.author: Doell
comments.body: Quote from: Chikito on June 10, 2023, 02:33:15 AMIf happens, Manchester City can be the 2nd club in the premier league after Manchester United. We can't ignore who is behind the achievement, yep, Pep Guardiola is one man behind the fantastic squad, if happens, He is the person who brings the Treble winner for the 2nd time after Barcelona 2008-2009. Pep could bring an 11th trophy for manchester city and a 1st-time champions league title. Tonight is a great history for Manchester City, I hope they don't waste this chance because Inter is now just an ordinary squad, nothing to special when compared to the final 2021 with Chelsea.Are you agree? or think differently?, because Inter quite surprised us this year.Agree ! Manchester City squad is stronger than last season, and yes Pep should get credit. I think nothing can stop Manchester City from winning the treble winner, before that I wasn't too sure about Manchester City. But when they handled Manchester United in the FA Cup, and won very well, now I really believe in Manchester City, although Inter is currently also considered good because they have reached the UCL Final but tonight a new history will be created.

comments.author: BITCOIN4X
comments.body: Quote from: Chikito on June 10, 2023, 02:33:15 AMIf happens, Manchester City can be the 2nd club in the premier league after Manchester United. We can't ignore who is behind the achievement, yep, Pep Guardiola is one man behind the fantastic squad, if happens, He is the person who brings the Treble winner for the 2nd time after Barcelona 2008-2009. Pep could bring an 11th trophy for manchester city and a 1st-time champions league title. Tonight is a great history for Manchester City, I hope they don't waste this chance because Inter is now just an ordinary squad, nothing to special when compared to the final 2021 with Chelsea.Are you agree? or think differently?, because Inter quite surprised us this year.Inter are not the most favorite team from Serie A to reach the final this season because Napoli and Milan are the more favorites in my opinion. However, Inter made it through the challenge by beating Milan in the semi-finals and earned the right to advance to the final against Manchester City.Pep Guardiola is a great coach who has led Manchester City to win quite a number of titles in his last 6 seasons. Including this season, he might make history for Manchester City if he wins his first Champions League for City. I agree that Manchester City will most likely win the treble winner, but only if their performance against Inter is very good. No surprises about Inter, they won't win the title this season.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: I know Guardiola has a vision and mission to achieve a treble winner why do I believe Manchester City can get that because they have beaten great teams like Munich and Madrid so to beat Intermilan I don't think it will be difficult because Intermilan are lucky to meet an easy club so they are lucky to qualify for the final meet manchester city.I think if Intermilan meets Munich or Madrid, maybe they won't make it to the final, but I won't underestimate Intermilan. Also, they could surprise Manchester City, but Guardiola will field all of his best players in the final to achieve the vision and mission of the treble winners.

comments.author: Oneandpure
comments.body: Left than few minutes to know with Manchester City get treble winner or not in this season, have been success double winner by getting FA Cup and Primer League tittle and one step left for Manchester City winning Champion League. However, Inter Milan is in good enough form to stop Manchester City's record of winning the treble winner this season, the only one teams left has chance for stopping Pep Guardiola success get treble winner in this season after Arsenal and Manchester United failed for stopping Manchester City winning Primer League and FA Cup.I am excited waiting few minutes left for Champion League final match between Manchester City vs Inter Milan start, I want to see Inter can stopping The Citizen get treble winner in this season.

comments.author: Mr.right85
comments.body: Quote from: Chikito on June 10, 2023, 02:33:15 AMIf happens, Manchester City can be the 2nd club in the premier league after Manchester United. We can't ignore who is behind the achievement, yep, Pep Guardiola is one man behind the fantastic squad, if happens, He is the person who brings the Treble winner for the 2nd time after Barcelona 2008-2009. Pep could bring an 11th trophy for manchester city and a 1st-time champions league title. There are always these histories and records to be made and broken. I think one of the most important thing now because, i do feel tonight's champions league final is already won and has been won since, Manchester City did beat Real Madrid.  The important thing about Manchester City tonight when they lift the trophy would be that, Pep Guardiola did fulfill his promises either consciously or unconsciously to Manchester City board, fans and players since he joined up that, there would be a champion's league trophy at the Etihad.Tonight would be a fulfilment of that promise and its going to be flawless

comments.author: klidex
comments.body: I agree with you, I personally also support that Manchester city deserves the treble even though the opponent Inter Milan has to face is defensively stronger and has more experience than Manchester city.But I'm sure that with Pep Guardiola's performance he will be able to bring Manchester City to win the Champions League trophy.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: Chikito on June 10, 2023, 02:33:15 AMIf happens, Manchester City can be the 2nd club in the premier league after Manchester United. We can't ignore who is behind the achievement, yep, Pep Guardiola is one man behind the fantastic squad, if happens, He is the person who brings the Treble winner for the 2nd time after Barcelona 2008-2009. Pep could bring an 11th trophy for manchester city and a 1st-time champions league title. Tonight is a great history for Manchester City, I hope they don't waste this chance because Inter is now just an ordinary squad, nothing to special when compared to the final 2021 with Chelsea.Are you agree? or think differently?, because Inter quite surprised us this year.If they don't get it tonight then they are cursed with black magic as there is no other way to explain it,Inter is not the same that was in 2010 where they were able under Mourinho to park the bus against Barcelona and win the final in 2010,they are not that strong now and they have been inconsistent in Serie A,the draw was good to them as they eliminated Benfica and Milan two teams not in the level of those who eliminated City,which are Bayern Munchen and Real Madrid,two strong favorite teams for the title here.I know Inter will try to drag down the game to make it to additional time and penalties as their only chance to succeed.

comments.author: Gianluca95
comments.body: I'm not convicted that Manchester City will easily win this match. Inter will try to do the best at its possibility. But yes, Manchester City if win will do the treble. I hope not, I don't like teams that can buy every player that wants, and break the market with its engagement (like PSG). Also, I don't like Guardiola, too much arrogant. Let's Go inter !

comments.author: _BlackStar
comments.body: Quote from: Gianluca95 on June 10, 2023, 06:52:29 PMI'm not convicted that Manchester City will easily win this match. Inter will try to do the best at its possibility. But yes, Manchester City if win will do the treble. I hope not, I don't like teams that can buy every player thatAs we saw in the first half - Manchester City dominated the game but their creativity was not as good as when they beat Real Madrid. Manchester City had several good chances, but Haaland was unable to get Onana to collect the ball from the net. Inter defended well and were prepared enough to make it difficult for Manchester City's players to create chances - but I thought Manchester City would have been better in the second half.Inter's game was uninspiring as they appeared to be planning a draw in 90 minutes of regular time. Inter tended to defend and capitalize on counter-attacks, but in all their efforts in the first half they failed. Manchester City also made some mistakes for not being calm under pressure, but I'm sure Pep will instruct something good for the second half as their victory won't be easy.

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: Quote from: Gianluca95 on June 10, 2023, 06:52:29 PMI'm not convicted that Manchester City will easily win this match. Inter will try to do the best at its possibility. But yes, Manchester City if win will do the treble. I hope not, I don't like teams that can buy every player that wants, and break the market with its engagement (like PSG). Also, I don't like Guardiola, too much arrogant. Let's Go inter ! This is just your personal opinion and how you feel about the club, what really matter now is how each team play out that’ll determine who will win the trophy. The fate of Manchester City winning the treble lies in their hands now. They’ve been able to win two trophy already and this is the most important amongst them, do you still think they won’t win the match and Inter Milan will be able to stop them? I doubt so but let’s watch out till the end.

comments.author: Pandu Geddon
comments.body: Pep is indeed an extraordinary coach. Man City is the team with the dominating power at the moment. even in the Premier League, Man City is very strong.facing Inter in the Champions League final is a new history for Man City. they certainly wouldn't waste this great opportunity. the score was still level, but Man City dominated and Inter with another strategy held back several opportunities from Man City.it seems the strategy of the two trainers is working well. we are still waiting for the final results, but I support Man City to win.

comments.author: Chikito
comments.body: Quote from: Gianluca95 on June 10, 2023, 06:52:29 PMI'm not convicted that Manchester City will easily win this match. Inter will try to do the best at its possibility. But yes, Manchester City if win will do the treble. I hope not, I don't like teams that can buy every player that wants, and break the market with its engagement (like PSG). Also, I don't like Guardiola, too much arrogant. Let's Go inter ! I just like your comment is different from others. Manchester City is looking hard to win tonight with only have 1 different goal, and inter is playing bad also by let the City player open improve during the match, this is what That arrogant person (Pep) wants by creating a hybrid formation of 4-2-3-1 to 3-2-4-1 because playing without right-back, that very genius coach I have ever seen.Congrats to Manchester City for the 1st time getting the Champions League Trophy and Trebel Winners.I just won a little penny tonight.

comments.author: mamesso
comments.body: Quote from: Chikito on June 11, 2023, 03:27:39 AMCongrats to Manchester City for the 1st time getting the Champions League Trophy and Trebel Winners.Congratulations kept coming to Manchester City after they managed to lock in victory in the final which made them successful in lifting the UCL trophy for the first time since the club was founded 143 years ago. Manchester City has just made history that is hard to forget, the success of lifting the UCL trophy completed the success of winning its first treble winner. Previously they had won the Premier League trophy and the FA Cup, then complemented it with the long-awaited trophy.After successfully lifting the UCL trophy, there will be several more trophies that can be won, Manchester will be challenged by Sevilla in the UEFA Super Cup and the FIFA Club World Cup. This season has been one of the most successful seasons in the history of Manchester City, Guardiola has become an important figure in their success in winning the treble winner.

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Quote from: Chikito on June 10, 2023, 02:33:15 AMTonight is a great history for Manchester City, I hope they don't waste this chance because Inter is now just an ordinary squad, nothing to special when compared to the final 2021 with Chelsea.Inter Milan proved not to be just an ordinary squad like you have described, they actually put a good fight up and also deserved the title from the way they were able to contain Manchester City. It was Manchester City's turn to win, that is why everything went in their favour, even after loosing one of their most creative and important players in just 35mins into the game to injury. They have worked very hard this season and all the players in Manchester City deserve to celebrate because they have successfully shown their dominance in the European football and are now the defending champions. (This is a good time to lock this thread, because Manchester City has already won the treble)

comments.author: Chikito
comments.body: Quote from: mamesso on June 11, 2023, 03:49:22 AMAfter successfully lifting the UCL trophy, there will be several more trophies that can be won, Manchester will be challenged by Sevilla in the UEFA Super Cup and the FIFA Club World Cup. This season has been one of the most successful seasons in the history of Manchester City, Guardiola has become an important figure in their success in winning the treble winner.But, as far as I know, both trophy is not as prestigious as others, maybe is not many Manchester City player star playing in Greece and Saudi Arabia because of the Holiday time. Besides that, Manchester City should become a big club with many achievements in Europa if got the last 2 trophies which will be of particular value for all players.Quote from: Bananington on June 11, 2023, 05:17:04 PMInter Milan proved not to be just an ordinary squad like you have described, they actually put a good fight up and also deserved the title from the way they were able to contain Manchester City. Yes, in fact, Inter Milan has received about 15 million euro as runner-up champions league. I think they got much profit on this session, because which a mediocre squad, and not many boughs expensive players, Inter Milan's income is the biggest from another europa rich club.
